title: I Found The Frosties Kid
description: In this video, Max Fosh sets out to find the 'Frosties Kid' from the popular cereal commercial. He tracks down the actor who played the iconic character and interviews him about his experience.
summary: Max Fosh searches for the actor who played the 'Frosties Kid' in a cereal commercial and interviews him about his role.
payoff: The payoff comes when Max Fosh finally meets the 'Frosties Kid' and learns about his life since appearing in the commercial. The humor comes from the nostalgia and quirky details of the actor's experience playing the character.
